channel.title: MARKETING
channel.description: In today's digital age, mobile devices have become an extension of ourselves. Discover the tips and techniques marketers need to prosper in the mobile era.
channel.author: Victoria Ang
channel.dc:creator: Victoria Ang

item.title: REAL-TIME MARKETING: EXAMPLES, TOOLS, AND BENEFITS FOR EFFECTIVE CAMPAIGNS
item.description: A clothing retailer — let’s call it Fashionista — was looking to increase sales during the holiday season. To achieve this goal, they decided to use real-time marketing to deliver personalized content and promotions to their customers.
item.author: Victoria Ang
item.dc:creator: Victoria Ang

item.title: WHY YOU SHOULD OPTIMIZE YOUR MARKETING STRATEGY WITH A MARKETING AUTOMATION SOFTWARE
item.description: Digital marketers are always looking for new and innovative ways to streamline and develop strategies that are efficient and effective. The goal of every digital marketing strategy, no matter the industry, is to provide a solution to a customer's problem.
item.author: Carena Marchi
item.dc:creator: Carena Marchi

item.title: BAD SENDER REPUTATION? HERE'S HOW TO CHECK YOURS AND ULTIMATELY FIX IT
item.description: Email is a strong marketing strategy to directly reach your digital audience and keep them informed on product updates, service announcements, special offers, and more. However, email marketing may prove ineffective if not successfully delivered to inboxes. One key factor that affects email deliverability is your sender reputation. Sender reputation goes by a few common names.
item.author: Victoria Ang
item.dc:creator: Victoria Ang
